name: Big Toe Pose
description: Padangusthasana (Big Toe Pose) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Grasp your big toe(s) and lengthen your spine, gently folding forward.  Benefits include hamstring stretch and calming the mind. Maintain a straight back and avoid rounding.

name: Gorilla Pose
description: Gorilla Pose (Padahastasana) is a beginner-level standing forward bend.  Benefits include hamstring stretch and stress relief.  Keep your spine long, knees slightly bent if needed, and reach for your feet, lengthening your torso.

name: Bird of Paradise Pose
description: A challenging standing balance (Svarga Dvijasana), Bird of Paradise Pose strengthens legs and core, improves balance and flexibility.  Maintain a straight spine, engage core, and lengthen through the extended leg.
